rooms.description: A welcoming area with open space leading into the central courtyard. Minimalist design enhanced by Bohemian decor.
An expansive living room that opens to the courtyard and pool area, adorned with vibrant fabrics and eclectic furniture.
A dedicated dining space adjacent to the living room, featuring an indoor-outdoor flow with glass partitions.
Modern kitchen incorporating local Indian aesthetics with Bohemian touches, designed for family gatherings.
A spacious master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the courtyard, decorated in Bohemian style with earthy tones.
A comfortable secondary bedroom designed for relaxation and tranquility, aligning with Vastu principles.
Bathroom attached to the master bedroom featuring dual sinks and a spa-like ambiance.
A dedicated library space enriched with bookshelves, reading nooks, and natural light, fostering a creative environment.
A dedicated swimming pool space integrated with the outdoor courtyard area for relaxation and social gatherings.

openings.description: Large wooden door with decorative elements reflecting Bohemian style.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room and library for abundant natural light.
Glass partitions separating the dining area from the open courtyard to enhance indoor-outdoor connectivity.
